title: “Whale and Dolphin” slab + sans
content:
Hi, I need help identyfying the slab and the sans used in the “Whale and Dolphin” magazine (UK). Thanks very much!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125330im_/http:/typophile.com/files/img0100_4688.jpeg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125330im_/http:/typophile.com/files/img0107_6579.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125330im_/http:/typophile.com/files/img0101_4284.jpg)

Font: 

 Stag + Stag sans 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125330/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Vykintas

comments.content:
"WHALE & DOLPHIN" & "CAMERA ACTION!" look like **Stag** (Bold/Medium) while "Iceland resumes large-scale whaling" looks like **Stag sans** both by Christian Schwartz:  
 [http://www.christianschwartz.com/stag.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125330/http:/www.christianschwartz.com/stag.shtml "http://www.christianschwartz.com/stag.shtml")
